ing: 1 large jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped
des: "This one is not for the kids!  Super spicy and perfect for those hot summer days when you want something besides potato salad to take to the neighborhood BBQ."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine peas, onion, relish, egg and jalapeno.  Stir in mayonnaise and cheese.  Chill for at least two hours before serving.
